src_original: khilamanavidhutānāṃ mārgajñāne sthitānāṃ śṛṇuta cariviśeṣān bodhisattvāna śreṣṭhān // 17 //
tgt_original: khilamalavidhutanāṃ mārgajñānasthitānāṃ  śṛṇuta varaviśeṣaṃ bodhisattvāṃśca śreṣṭhān || 1 ||

src_original: kuśalaśatasahasraṃ saṃciyā kalpakoṭyā buddhaśatasahasrān pūjayitvā maharṣīn /
tgt_original: kuśalasatasahasraṃ saṃcitaṃ kalpakoṭayā  subuddhaśatasahasraṃ pūjayitvā gṛhītam |  pratyekajinavarānvai pūjayitvā tvanantān

src_original: vipulagatimatīnāṃ buddhajñānāśayānāṃ daśabalasamatulyaṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 19 //  yāva jina triyadhvā pūjanārthāya pūjaṃ khagapathapariṇāmaṃ śodhanaṃ sarvakṣetram /
tgt_original: hṛtaśritacaritānāṃ puṇyajñānodgatānām |  vipulagatimatīnāṃ puṇyajñānāśayānāṃ  daśabalasamatulyaṃ jāyate bodhicittam || 3 ||

src_original: jinaśaraṇagatānāṃ bodhicaryāśayānāṃ tribhuvanahitasādhyaṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 22//  nihitaśubhamatīnāṃ dāntusaumyāśayānāṃ sakalahitavidhāne jāyate bodhicittam // 23 //  pracalitaśubhakāryā dhīravīryotsahā ye nikhilajanahitārthe prodyayāmāna siṃhāḥ /
tgt_original: pracalati śubhakārye dhīravīryāḥ sahāyā  nikhilajanahitārthaṃ prodyate mānasiṃhaḥ |

src_original: avirataguṇasādhyā nirjitakleśasaṃghā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 24 //

tgt_original: jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam || 7 ||  susamavahitacittā dhvastamohāndhakārā  vigalitamadamānā tyaktasaṃkliṣṭamārgāḥ |

src_original: śamasukhaniratā ye tyaktasaṃsārasaṅgā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 25//

vimalakhasamacittā jñānavijñānavijñā nihatanamucimārā vāntakleśābhimānāḥ /  jinapadaśaraṇasthā labdhatattvārthakā ye sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 26 //  tribhuvanaśivasādhyopāyavijñānadhīrāḥ kalibalaparihāropāyavidyarddhimantaḥ /  sugataguṇasamīhā ye ca puṇyānurāgāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 27 //
tgt_original: jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam || 8 ||  vimalakhasamacittā jñānavijñānavijñā  nihatanamucimārā vāntakleśābhimānāḥ |  jinapadaśaraṇasthā labdhatattvārthakāye

src_original: tribhuvanahitakāmā bodhisaṃbhārapūrye praṇihitamanasā ye duṣkare 'pi caranti /
tgt_original: sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam || 9 ||  tribhuvanaśivasādhyopāyavijñānadhīrāḥ  karibalaparihāropāyavidṛddhimantaḥ |  praṇihitamanasā ye duṣkare'pi caranti |  avirataśubhakarma prodyatāṃ bodhisattvāḥ  sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam || 11 ||

src_original: avirataśubhakarmaprodyatā bodhisattvāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 28 //  daśabalaguṇakāmā bodhicaryānuraktā vijitakalibalaughāstyaktamānānuṣaṅgāḥ /
anugataśubhamārgā labdhadharmārthakāmā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 29 //
tgt_original: anugataśubhamārgā labdhadharmārthakāmā  jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam || 12 ||

src_original: iti gaṇitaguṇāṃśā bodhicaryāścarantu jinapadapraṇidhānāḥ satsamṛddhiṃ labhantu /
tgt_original: iti gaṇitaguṇāṃśā bodhicaryāścarantu  jinapadapraṇidhānā satsamṛddhiṃ labhantu |

src_original: triguṇapariviśuddhā bodhicittaṃ labhantu triśaraṇapariśuddhā bodhisattvā bhavantu // 30 //
tgt_original: tribhuvanapariśuddhā bodhicittaṃ labhantu  triśaraṇapariśuddhā bodhisattvā bhavantu || 13 ||
samyak kṣāntivrataṃ dhṛtvā kṣāntibhṛt kuśalī bhavet |
tataḥ sudurjayāṃ prāptaḥ sa tuṣitādhipo bhavet || 28 ||
sarvān bodhau pratiṣṭhāpya prāṇiṣu pārago bhavet || 42 ||
sarvaduṣṭān vinirjitya sambodhikṛtaniścayaḥ || 43 ||  samyagyatnasamutsāhaiḥ sarvatīrthyān vinirjayet |
tataḥ sādhumatīṃ prāpto mahābrahmā bhavet kṛtī || 44 ||

src_original: dharmameghāṃ tataḥ prāpto maheśvaro bhavet kṛtī // 65 //
tgt_original: dharmameghāṃ tataḥ prāpto maheśvaro bhavet kṛtī || 48 ||

src_original: tatrasthaḥ pālayan sattvān sarvākārānubodhanaiḥ /  sarvākāravare jñāne pratiṣṭhāpya prabodhayan // 66 //
tgt_original: tatrasthaḥ pālayan sarvān sarvākārānubodhanaiḥ |  sarvākāravare jñāne pratiṣṭhāpya prabodhayet || 49 ||

src_original: iti matvā bhavadbhiśca saṃbodhipadalabdhaye /  daśapāramitāpūryai caritavyaṃ samāhitaiḥ // 69 //
tgt_original: iti matvā bhuvabhiśca sambuddhapadalabdhaye |  daśapāramitārūpe caritavyaṃ samāhitaiḥ || 52 ||

src_original: tathā bodhiṃ śivāṃ prāpya caturmārān vijitya ca /
tgt_original: tathā bodhiṃ śivāṃ prāpya caturmārān vinirjayet |
